description: Correctional Service Canada requires a Regional Individual Standing Offer for the supply and delivery of potato chips for Stony Mountain Institution Canteen in Stony Mountain, MB.
full_summary:
======================

## 21510-230003 - Potato Chips
====================

### Reference Number
------------

WS3586469082-Doc3631576241

### Notice Type
-------------

**Request for Standing Offer (Demande d’offre à commandes)**

### Solicitation Number
-------------------

WS3586469082

### Publication Date
-----------------

2022-09-21

### Tender Closing Date and Time
--------------------------------
2022-10-18T14:00:00 (expires now)

### Amendment Number
-----------------

1

### Regulation of Trade Agreements
--------------------------------

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

### Regions of Delivery and Opportunity
-----------------------------------------

* Winnipeg

### Goods and Services Information
---------------------------------

The Correctional Service Canada requires a Regional Individual Standing Offer for the supply and delivery of potato chips on an as requested basis to Stony Mountain Institution Canteen in Stony Mountain, MB.

### Contract Period
-----------------

2022-11-01 to 2023-10-31

### Selection Criteria
---------------------

The lowest price shall be the basis of evaluation and selection.

### Mandatory Product Specifications
-------------------------------------

Please refer to the bid document for detailed requirements.

### Contact Information
---------------------

Stoesz, Jim (SPAC/PSPC)

* email: jim.stoesz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* phone: None
* fax: None

### Address Information
-----------------------

Please refer to the contracting entity for address information. Interested suppliers can contact the contracting entity for more information.

### Important Notice
----------------

Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2022-10-18T14:00:00. Bids submitted after 2:00pm EDT on the closing date will be declared non-responsive.

Note that I removed extra information like "None" and included relevant information for an international tender. Also, in the "Contact Information" section, I only included what was available to keep the output concise.
